src_original: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,  tasya ca tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kuryuḥ,
tgt_original: 時彼病人親屬知識若能為彼歸依世尊藥師瑠璃光如來，請諸眾僧轉讀此經，燃七層之燈、懸著五色續命神幡，或有是處彼識得還，如在夢中明了自見。

src_original: sthānametadvidyate yat tasya tadvijñānaṃ punarapi pratinivarteta,  svapnāntaragata ivātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |  yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)  divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punarapi nivarteta,
tgt_original: 或經七日、或二十一日、或三十五日、或四十九日，彼識還時如從夢覺，皆自憶知善不善業所得果報。

src_original: (dvitīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam,
tgt_original: 第二大願：

src_original: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇiriva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt |  vipulakāyastadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt |  tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāśca,  ye cāpi puruṣāḥ,  te tamisrāyāṃ ratrāvandhakāre nānādiśaṃ gaccheyuḥ |  sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca)  karmāṇi kurvīran ||
tgt_original: 願我來世得菩提時，身如瑠璃內外明徹，淨無瑕穢光明廣大，功德巍巍，身善安住，焰網莊嚴過於日月，幽冥眾生悉蒙開曉，隨意所趣作諸事業。

src_original: tṛtīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate------tadā bodhiprātptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātorakṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ |  kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt ||
tgt_original: 第三大願： 願我來世得菩提時，以無量無邊智慧方便令諸有情皆得無盡所受用物，莫令眾生有所乏少。

src_original: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpto'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāśca,  te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran ||
tgt_original: 第四大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若諸有情行邪道者，悉令安住菩提道中； 若行聲聞獨覺乘者，皆以大乘而安立之。

src_original: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,  te sarve akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ syuḥ susaṃvṛtāḥ |
tgt_original: 第五大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若有無量無邊有情於我法中修行梵行，一切皆令得不缺戒、具三聚戒；

src_original: mā ca kasyaci(t)  śīlavipannasya mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt ||
tgt_original: 設有毀犯，聞我名已還得清淨，不墮惡趣。

src_original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,  te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ ||
tgt_original: 第六大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若諸有情其身下劣，諸根不具、醜陋頑愚、盲聾瘖瘂、踤躄背僂、白癩癲狂種種病苦，聞我名已，一切皆得端政黠慧、諸根完具、無諸疾苦。

src_original: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā daridrā duḥkhitāḥ, sace(t)  teṣāṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ karṇapuṭe nipatet,  teṣāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśameyuḥ,  nīrogāśca nirupadravāśca te syuryāva bodhiparyavasānam ||
tgt_original: 第七大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若諸有情眾病逼切，無救無歸、無醫無藥、無親無家、貧窮多苦，我之名號一經其耳，眾病悉除、身心安樂、家屬資具悉皆豐足，乃至證得無上菩提。

src_original: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā yaḥ kaścinmātṛgrāmo nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃlkiṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo mama nāmadheyaṃ dhārayet,  tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam ||
tgt_original: 第八大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若有女人為女百惡之所逼惱，極生厭離，願捨女身； 聞我名已，一切皆得轉女成男，具丈夫相，乃至證得無上菩提。

src_original: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpte'haṃ sarvasattvān mārapāśabandhanabaddhān nānādṛṣṭigahanasaṃkaṭaprāptān sarvamārapāśadṛṣṭigatibhyo vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrvyeṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam ||
tgt_original: 第九大願； 願我來世得菩提時，令諸有情出魔羅網，解脫一切外道纏縛； 若墮種種惡見稠林，皆當引攝置於正見，漸令修習諸菩薩行，速證無上正等菩提。

src_original: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta--yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,  ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhirupadrutā vimānitāśca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
tgt_original: 第十大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若諸有情王法所繩，縛錄鞭撻、繫閉牢獄或當刑戮，及餘無量災難陵辱，悲愁煎迫身心受苦；

src_original: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran ||
tgt_original: 若聞我名，以我福德威神力故，皆得解脫一切憂苦。

src_original: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
tgt_original: 第十一大願： 願我來世得菩提時，若諸有情飢渴所惱，為求食故造諸惡業；

src_original: te mam nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,  ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam ||
tgt_original: 得聞我名專念受持，我當先以上妙飲食飽足其身，後以法味畢竟安樂而建立之。

src_original: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanti, sace(t)
tgt_original: 第十二大願：

src_original: teṣāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānavistaravibhaṅgam |  vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānāmanugrahamupādāya |  atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
tgt_original: 曼殊室利！ 汝以大悲勸請我說諸佛名號本願功德，為拔業障所纏有情，利益安樂像法轉時諸有情故。 汝今諦聽極善思惟，當為汝說。

src_original: prāgeva anyaṃ dhanaskandham ||  punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
tgt_original: 復次曼殊室利！ 若諸有情雖於如來受諸學處而破尸羅；

src_original: te śīlavipattimāpadyante,
tgt_original: 有雖不破尸羅而破軌則；

src_original: dṛṣṭivipattimācāravipattiṃ vā kadācidāpadyante |  śīlavipannā ye punaḥ śīlavanto bhavanti,
tgt_original: 有於尸羅軌則雖得不壞然毀正見；
